chinese: n. 培根
早餐我想吃培根和鸡蛋。
english: I like to have bacon and eggs for my breakfast

chinese: adj.巨大的，广大的
与浩瀚无垠的宇宙相比，我们的星球是如此渺
english: Compared with the immense universe, our planet is so small

chinese: m.页边的空白，边缘
我经常在页边空白处做笔记。
english: I often make notes in the margin

chinese: n. 意识
他试图增强人们对回收利用的重要性的意识。
english: He tries to raise people's awareness of the importance of recycling

chinese: n.短途旅游
参加学校郊游的孩子们正在享受他们的春游。
english: The kids on the school trip are enjoying their spring outing

chinese: n.询问；调查；打听
这对夫妻正在向客服人员咨询。
english: The couple is making an inquiry to the support staff

chinese: m. 图案；模型，模式；典范；版式；样品 vt.形成图案；促成（某种行为模式）
这个图案由许多不同颜色的三角形组成。
english: The pattern consists of many different colored triangles

chinese: ad，可再生的；可继续的 .，再生性能
风能是可再生的。
adj，极限的；极端的 n.极端
年轻人喜欢极限运动，老年人都认为这是在自取灭亡。
english: While youngsters enjoy extreme sports, old people think it's courting death

chinese: n.洗液，洗涤剂
如果你的皮肤较白，你就一定要在阳光下玩耍前涂上防晒霜。
english: If you have light skin, make sure to put on suntan lotion before you play in the sun

chinese: 凶证实，证明
医生证明他已经去世。
english: He was certified dead by the doctor

chinese: n.外交礼节；外交议定书 v.拟定议定书w.把•••写入议定书
当总统们会面的时候，外交礼节规定他们必须握手。
english: When presidents meet, protocol requires that they shake hands

chinese: n. 黄油；奉承话 vt.涂黄油于⋯•
她早餐经常吃黄油面包。
english: She usually has bread and butter for breakfast

chinese: adj.技术的，工艺的
她负责解答技术问题。
english: She is responsible for answering technical questions

chinese: n.候机室，休息室，酒吧间；懒散的步子L（懒散地）倚，躺
人们在候机室里等待登机。
english: People wait in the lounge for boarding

chinese: n，晋升；提升；促销；促进
他在工作中得到了晋升，现在是这家公司的首席执行官
english: He got a promotion and is now the CEO of the company
